More information:
We have our own version of debugger for voice app. 
We are attempting to convert from Eclipse 3.2 to 3.3 version. Consequently we are also converting from WTP `.5.3 to 2.0.1

We hit the NPE in class ModelQueryAdapterFactoryForXML (line 180) that looks like this:

derivedResource = ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace().getRoot().getProject(basePath.segment(0));

In our case the basePath is null and therefore basePath.segment(0) causes the NPE.

However if I replace the line with what used to be in 1.5.3 version of the class ---

derivedPath = ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace().getRoot().getLocation().append(basePath);

(provided I also move the declaration of derived Path up)seems to work ok.

We do not directly interact with the class. Instead we get there by passing a valid XML document to createPages() that can be deduced from this stack trace excerpt:
